text: aṉṟiyum allāhtāṉ uṅkaḷai (mutalil) maṇṇāl paṭaittāṉ; piṉṉar oru tuḷi intiriyattiliruntu - piṉ uṅkaḷai (āṇ, peṇ) jōṭiyāka avaṉ ākkiṉāṉ, avaṉ aṟiyāmal entap peṇṇum karppam tarippatumillai piracavippatumillai. Ivvāṟē oruvaruṭaiya vayatu atikamākkappaṭuvatum, avaruṭaiya vayatiliruntu kuṟaippatum (lavhul mahḥpūḷ eṉṉum) ēṭṭil illāmalillai niccayamāka itu allāhvukku eḷitāṉatēyākum
